channel.title: Usa on Ticki's blog
channel.description: Recent content in Usa on Ticki's blog

item.title: What we learned from the election results
item.description: It was a surprising and intense outcome to watch yesterday night. As you probably know by now, Trump won, contrary to all predictions and calls. But why? I’m not an US citzen, but I have followed the race with great passion, and I want to give my outsider two-cents on ‘what the hell is going’ in United States of America. So, what did we actually learn? 1. USA is a post-fact society Many of the things Trump have said are lies, and it is often trivial to prove so.
